summary: In this context, 1,3-xylene is mentioned as a specific chemical being studied for its effects on cell viability in dermal equivalents. The study involves calculating the concentration of m-xylene in fibroblasts and assessing its impact on cell viability using the MTT assay. While 1,3-xylene is a type of chemical, the context does not elaborate on its broader relationship with other chemicals, focusing instead on its specific role in the experiment.
